newTasks.title: Empire Alliance System Foundation
newTasks.description: Implement the core alliance system for empires/nations with diplomatic negotiations, treaty management, and political dynamics.
newTasks.details:
Build the AllianceEngine class that:
- Manages alliance formation, membership, and dissolution
- Implements diplomatic reputation and trust systems
- Handles treaty creation, negotiation, and enforcement
- Provides alliance types: trade, military, research, cultural
- Integrates with economic engine for trade benefits
- Supports AI-powered diplomatic negotiations
- Maintains alliance hierarchies and leadership structures
newTasks.testStrategy: Verify alliance formation workflows, treaty enforcement, reputation calculations, and economic integration. Test diplomatic AI responses and multi-empire alliance scenarios.

newTasks.title: Hero Party Formation & Management
newTasks.description: Create the hero party system allowing individual heroes to form groups for shared adventures and quests.
newTasks.details:
Implement HeroPartyEngine that:
- Enables hero recruitment and party formation (2-6 members)
- Manages party roles: tank, DPS, support, specialist
- Handles party leadership and decision-making
- Implements shared resources and treasury management
- Tracks party reputation and achievements
- Provides skill synergies and combined abilities
- Manages experience sharing and progression
newTasks.testStrategy: Test party formation, role assignments, resource sharing, leadership changes, and skill synergy calculations. Verify experience distribution and party dynamics.

newTasks.title: Intergalactic Quest System
newTasks.description: Build the comprehensive quest system for hero parties with dynamic generation, shared encounters, and branching narratives.
newTasks.details:
Create QuestEngine that:
- Generates dynamic intergalactic quests with AI narratives
- Supports quest categories: exploration, combat, diplomatic, research, economic
- Implements instanced content for private party experiences
- Manages persistent world events affecting all players
- Handles cross-party interactions and encounters
- Provides dynamic difficulty scaling based on party composition
- Creates branching narratives with meaningful consequences
newTasks.testStrategy: Verify quest generation, instance management, difficulty scaling, narrative branching, and cross-party interactions. Test quest completion and reward distribution.

newTasks.title: Alliance Economic Integration
newTasks.description: Integrate alliance systems with the economic engine to provide trade benefits, shared resources, and economic warfare capabilities.
newTasks.details:
Extend economic systems to support:
- Alliance trade networks with preferential routes and reduced tariffs
- Joint resource extraction and infrastructure projects
- Alliance currencies and exchange rate dynamics
- Economic warfare: embargos, sanctions, economic espionage
- Shared economic benefits and burden distribution
- Alliance investment opportunities and collective projects
newTasks.testStrategy: Test alliance trade benefits, resource sharing mechanics, economic warfare effects, and currency systems. Verify economic integration with existing systems.

newTasks.title: Real-Time Alliance & Party Communication
newTasks.description: Implement real-time communication systems for alliance diplomacy and hero party coordination using WebSocket infrastructure.
newTasks.details:
Build communication systems that:
- Provide secure diplomatic channels for alliance leaders
- Enable real-time hero party coordination during quests
- Support alliance-wide announcements and discussions
- Implement intelligence sharing networks
- Handle emergency protocols and rapid response
- Manage tactical planning tools for hero parties
- Synchronize quest states and objective completion
newTasks.testStrategy: Test real-time messaging, channel security, message routing, and synchronization. Verify communication during diplomatic negotiations and quest coordination.

newTasks.title: AI-Powered Diplomatic Negotiations
newTasks.description: Create sophisticated AI systems for alliance negotiations, treaty generation, and diplomatic relationship modeling.
newTasks.details:
Implement DiplomaticAI that:
- Generates realistic treaty terms and negotiation strategies
- Models dynamic trust and reputation between empires
- Provides conflict resolution and compromise suggestions
- Analyzes alliance benefits and optimization opportunities
- Simulates diplomatic personalities and negotiation styles
- Handles complex multi-party negotiations
- Predicts diplomatic outcomes and consequences
newTasks.testStrategy: Test AI negotiation quality, treaty generation, relationship modeling accuracy, and conflict resolution effectiveness. Verify diplomatic personality consistency.

newTasks.title: Quest AI & Dynamic Content Generation
newTasks.description: Build AI systems for dynamic quest creation, narrative generation, and adaptive encounter design based on galaxy state and party composition.
newTasks.details:
Create QuestAI that:
- Generates unique quests based on current galaxy state and events
- Creates compelling narratives and dialogue for quest encounters
- Adapts encounter difficulty based on party composition and skills
- Models long-term consequences of quest outcomes
- Generates NPC personalities and interactions
- Creates branching storylines with meaningful player choices
- Balances quest rewards with economic and progression systems
newTasks.testStrategy: Test quest generation quality, narrative coherence, difficulty scaling accuracy, and consequence modeling. Verify NPC interaction quality and story branching.

newTasks.title: Alliance Intelligence & Espionage Networks
newTasks.description: Integrate alliance systems with the intelligence framework to enable shared espionage, counter-intelligence, and information warfare.
newTasks.details:
Extend intelligence systems to support:
- Alliance intelligence sharing networks and protocols
- Coordinated espionage operations against rival alliances
- Counter-intelligence to protect alliance secrets
- Information warfare and propaganda campaigns
- Intelligence-based diplomatic advantages
- Spy network coordination across alliance members
- Intelligence market integration for alliance benefits
newTasks.testStrategy: Test intelligence sharing, coordinated operations, counter-intelligence effectiveness, and information warfare impact. Verify integration with existing intelligence systems.

newTasks.title: Galaxy-Wide Events & Persistent World
newTasks.description: Create persistent world events that affect all players, alliances, and hero parties, with long-term consequences for the galaxy.
newTasks.details:
Implement GalaxyEventEngine that:
- Generates galaxy-wide threats and opportunities
- Manages persistent world state changes
- Coordinates multi-alliance responses to major events
- Handles cross-party encounters during world events
- Tracks long-term consequences of player actions
- Balances event impact across different player groups
- Integrates with economic, political, and quest systems
newTasks.testStrategy: Test event generation, world state persistence, multi-group coordination, and long-term consequence tracking. Verify event impact balance and system integration.

newTasks.title: Gifting & Tribute System
newTasks.description: Implement comprehensive gifting and tribute systems enabling resource transfers between empires, alliances, heroes, and parties with full diplomatic and economic integration.
newTasks.details:
Create GiftingEngine that:
- Enables gifts, tribute, trade, loans, and reparations between all entity types
- Maintains strict money conservation with full audit trails
- Implements cultural gift preferences and ceremonial contexts
- Provides tribute scheduling and automatic collection systems
- Calculates diplomatic relationship impacts and economic effects
- Supports cross-level transfers (empire↔hero, alliance↔party)
- Includes fraud detection and transfer validation
- Integrates with economic engine for market impact analysis
newTasks.testStrategy: Test all transfer types, money conservation, cultural preferences, tribute scheduling, relationship impacts, and fraud detection. Verify integration with economic and diplomatic systems.

newTasks.title: Alliance & Hero Analytics Dashboard
newTasks.description: Create comprehensive analytics and visualization tools for alliance performance, hero party effectiveness, and quest success metrics.
newTasks.details:
Build analytics systems that:
- Track alliance economic performance and diplomatic success
- Monitor hero party effectiveness and quest completion rates
- Visualize alliance relationship networks and influence
- Analyze quest difficulty and reward balance
- Provide diplomatic intelligence and trend analysis
- Generate performance reports for alliance leaders
- Create hero progression and achievement tracking
newTasks.testStrategy: Test analytics accuracy, visualization quality, performance tracking, and report generation. Verify data integration across alliance and hero systems.
